Class JamConsole

java.lang.Object
  |

        |

                    +--javax.swing.JPanel

                          +--jam.JamConsole
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, MessageHandler, java.io.Serializable
public class JamConsole
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements MessageHandler, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Class Console displays a output of commands and error messages and allows the input of commands using the keyboard.

Version:
1.2 alpha last edit 15 Feb 2000
Author:
Ken Swartz, Dale Visser
See Also:
Serialized Form

setLogFileName

public java.lang.String setLogFileName(java.lang.String name)
                                throws JamException
Create a file for the log to be saved to. The method appends a number (starting at 1) to the file name if the file already exists.

JamException - exceptions that go to the console
